translations: 行为不端，举止失礼；发生故障，失灵

sentences.sentence: I struggle to keep my temper with the kids when they misbehave.
sentences.translation: 孩子们淘气时，我强捺住性子不发脾气。

sentences.sentence: Paying children too much attention when they misbehave can be self-defeating.
sentences.translation: 孩子有不良行为时，小题大做可能适得其反。
孩子们每天都不守规矩。
